vote.title: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 1 to increase the professional services contract with Brown Reynolds Watford Architects, Inc. for architectural and engineering services for the schematic design, design development, construction documents, bidding and negotiation, and construction administration for the renovation of one additional recreation center facility, Reverchon Recreation Center located at 3505 Maple Avenue - Not to exceed $124,030.00, from $223,197.00 to $347,227.00 - Financing: Park and Recreation Facilities (B) Fund (2024 General Obligation Bond Fund)
vote.description: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 1 to increase the professional services contract with Brown Reynolds Watford Architects, Inc. for architectural and engineering services for the schematic design, design development, construction documents, bidding and negotiation, and construction administration for the renovation of one additional recreation center facility, Reverchon Recreation Center located at 3505 Maple Avenue - Not to exceed $124,030.00, from $223,197.00 to $347,227.00 - Financing: Park and Recreation Facilities (B) Fund (2024 General Obligation Bond Fund)
